fvt.options.defaults.tooltip: WARNING! This will reset all options to their default values!
fvt.noToolBreaking.name: Prevent Breaking
fvt.noToolBreaking.tooltip: Makes your tools stop working at certain durability (will stop at 2 durability for most tools). This includes swords, pickaxes, axes, shovels, hoes, tridents, bows and crossbows.
fvt.tool_breaking_override.name: Tool Breaking Override
fvt.tool_warning.name: Show Warning
fvt.tool_warning.tooltip: When your active tool goes below 10% durability and have 12 or less uses a red warning text appears on your screen for two seconds.
fvt.tool_warning.text.main_hand: Main hand tool has %d durability left!
fvt.tool_warning.scale.name: Warning Text Scale
fvt.tool_warning.scale.tooltip: How big the warning text should be.
fvt.tool_warning.position.name: Warning Position
fvt.tool_warning.position.tooltip: States where the warning text should appear.
fvt.entity_outline.name: Entity Outline
fvt.entity_outline.tooltip: Makes all entities (except players) glow white and be seen through walls.
fvt.fullbright.name: Fullbright
fvt.fullbright.tooltip: Makes you see in dark just as if it was a bright day.
fvt.freecam.name: Freecam
fvt.freecam.tooltip: Allows you to leave your body and explore your surroundings. Works similar to spectator.
